env.name: RECORDS
env.value: "$PROJECT_DIR$/../../..//OneDrive - City University of Hong Kong - Student/datasets/tfrecords"

mapping.local-root: $PROJECT_DIR$/../../..//OneDrive - City University of Hong Kong - Student/datasets/tfrecords

option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --tag pmo-invest-local0 --model.name pmo --model.dir "$PROJECT_DIR$/../../..//OneDrive - City University of Hong Kong - Student/datasets/experiments/URL-experiments/saved_results/pmo-invest-local0" --model.num_clusters 10 --model.backbone resnet18_moe --model.pretrained --source "$PROJECT_DIR$/../../..//OneDrive - City University of Hong Kong - Student/datasets/experiments/URL-experiments/saved_results/url" --source_moe "$PROJECT_DIR$/../../..//OneDrive - City University of Hong Kong - Student/datasets/experiments/URL-experiments/saved_results/url" --data.train ilsvrc_2012 omniglot aircraft cu_birds dtd quickdraw fungi vgg_flower --data.val ilsvrc_2012 omniglot aircraft cu_birds dtd quickdraw fungi vgg_flower --data.test ilsvrc_2012 omniglot aircraft cu_birds dtd quickdraw fungi vgg_flower traffic_sign mscoco mnist cifar10 cifar100 --train.type standard --train.freeze_backbone --train.loss_type task+kd+ce+pure+hv --train.optimizer adam --train.learning_rate 5e-06 --train.weight_decay 1e-07 --train.selector_learning_rate 5e-06 --train.max_iter 1000 --train.summary_freq 100 --train.pool_freq 10 --train.mo_freq 10 --train.n_mo 10 --train.hv_coefficient 0 --train.cosine_anneal_freq 200 --train.eval_freq 200 --train.eval_size 50 --train.n_obj 2 --train.n_mix 2 --train.cond_mode film_opt --train.best_criteria hv --train.cluster_center_mode mov_avg --train.kd_coefficient 1 --train.kd_type kernelcka --train.kd_T_extent 2 --train.pure_coefficient 0 --cluster.logit_scale 0.5 --train.ce_coefficient 1 --train.cluster_loss_type ce
